articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Shorter showers, slower drives and an Eiffel Tower blackout: How Europe plans to cut gas usage this winter - CNBC
articles.description: From cutting down on showering to five minutes and driving slower, Europe is embarking on a goal to reduce gas use in time for winter.
articles.content: From cutting down on shower time, driving slower and fining shopkeepers for not closing their doors, Europeans are embarking on a target of reducing energy usage in time for winter, and some citizens… [+7055 chars]

articles.title: Almost two thirds of people in Ireland are in favour of Ukraine joining the EU, poll shows - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: That’s according to the latest annual European Movement Ireland ‘Ireland and the EU’ poll.
articles.content:
ALMOST TWO THIRDS of people in Ireland are in favour of Ukraine joining the European Union, new polling shows.
